name: Jigsaw Towns
description:
Created in 48 hours for GMTK21 Jam (although not eligible for the game jam due to having problems when submitting) for the theme of "Joined Together" - in this game you must connect towns together using roads so that merchants can travel between them and raise money.  All the tiles you can place are jigsaw pieces.

Game uses WASD/Arrow Keys to control the camera and mouse to select and place objects on the map. Jigsaw pieces are free to place, but the other structures you can build require resources which can be obtained once you have two connected towns and merchants travelling between them to raise you money.

Game contains no audio.

[Bugs/Issues]

Sometimes when placing a bomb on a tile it will say that the tile has a structure on it when it does not.
